text: The Pramod Sawant Ministry came into existence on 19 March 2019. He was serving as the Speaker of the Goa assembly before being sworn in as Chief Minister, after the death of the sitting chief minister Manohar Parrikar. ==Council of Ministers== The following is the list of the first Pramod Sawant Ministry.Pramod Sawant retains Parrikar’s portfolios, makes no alterations to Goa cabinet {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
